column4: hey i have a dell 1450 wireless usb adaptor and cant' get my internet working.. caN anyone help me? i'm using ubuntu 8.4
when i check using the console, my wlan0 says that the "ESSID: off/any"
when i check using the console, my wlan0 says that the "ESSID: off/any" what does this mean and how do i fix it?
can someone PLEASE help me get my networking set up? I can't use my computer until it works.. i wiped windows
when i check using the console, my wlan0 says that the "ESSID: off/any" what does this mean and how do i fix it?
I can try, erm, why dont you set the essid?
how do i do that danbhfive, and thank you?
i'll try that and then come back. i think itll give an error
so i tried iwconfig wlan0 essid K6VA3 as SUDO and i didnt get an error but nothing happened.. no output
and when i ran iwconfig again it still said : any/none
ive done all this in network manager GUI if that counts...
you should input that info into the iwconfig command too
no, but iwconfig --help should tell it all to you
